Description: Almost brand new with topline Wolf range and subzero refrigerator. 3 full-sized bedrooms with 3 full baths, expansive master suite, and loft. Big backyard, 2 assigned nontandem parking spots, exclusive usage 10X10 storage shed. Walk to everything, elementary school, public transport, star market, splash park. The tenant pays all utilities and maintenance. Good credit is a must 2.5-3X income to monthly rent. A minimum one-year lease is required.
